A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The picture lacks the soul and vision of the originals while overly relying on effects and established tropes to tell a story. The triumphant Star Wars score & flavor meets nihilistic writing and direction which leaves us with confused faces and a tone deaf end result. It seeks the approval of the academy and the mainstream critics by incorporating token and contrived geopolitcal perspectives as a substitute for proper character developement and story arc.
